website_summaries.verdict: Ginny Weasley is a beautiful doll made with impressive attention to detail, and the perfect match for the posable Harry Potter doll.
pros: Looks like the Ginny Weasley character, thanks to her long red hair and school uniform
Movable parts are easy to position into fun poses
Makes a nice addition to any Harry Potter collection
cons: Rare complaints of packages arriving damaged

customer_reviews.title: Ginny Weasley - hooray!
customer_reviews.text: Was SO happy to find this doll; since it is not always available in our local stores, we jumped at the chance to buy it when we saw it on Amazon. Fabulous detail; great addition to the set. Please note - there are two versions of the Ginny Weasley doll so make sure you are buying the one you want. (Easiest difference to spot is the hairstyle).
customer_reviews.author: Laurie K. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with Harry Potter as both the movies and books came out so I was SO excited to add these dolls to my collection of memorabilia. I love posing these characters on my shelves in different ways or scenes and they’re super cute and great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Nix

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Ginny Weasley doll . This is another doll in the Harry Potter series that they did a great job on. She looks very realistic. The outfit is great. If you are a collector or your this is your child’s favorite movie series you will not be disappointed by this product.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Great Doll!
customer_reviews.text: The doll arrived in time and was as described in the advertisement. My daughter loves it. Its made of good quality and all moving parts function regularly. The clothing was accurate (pointed out by my 7 year old daughter) as in the movie. The price was good too!
customer_reviews.author: Dimuth Siritunga

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift She loved it
customer_reviews.text: She loved the doll. The doll itself was FINE but (only because you asked) the box it came in was not in very good shape bent and crushed in at the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Marggie T

customer_reviews.title: Pretty doll
customer_reviews.text: Pretty doll. I love her hair, expression and her clothes
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great dolls.
customer_reviews.text: These dolls are great. Look wonderful and if you're patient you can get them for a really decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Harry Potter Ginny Weasley Doll
customer_reviews.text: A present for a big Harry Potter fan. She loves them all. l brought the whole collection for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty doll!
customer_reviews.text: We love this doll! She is meticulously detailed and looked very much like the young actress who portrayed her!
customer_reviews.author: L. A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Harry Potter Doll
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter simply loves her Harry Potter doll. Pricing was perfect for this quality doll.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and detail
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the Barbie dolls we have. Lots of detail and much more realistic looking. I bought the whole collection.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: A fan favorite
customer_reviews.text: Well made dolls. We bought Harry, Hermione, Ron, Draco and Ginny. All are great quality. Limbs move well and clothes are sturdy. Kids play with them every day since received 2 months ago and they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: RascalBigs

customer_reviews.title: My girls love them
customer_reviews.text: Gave them to my granddaughters on Halloween, they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Ginny is my daughters favorite and I was so excited to find this doll! My 7 year old loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amus

customer_reviews.title: Received in bad condition.
customer_reviews.text: This doll would have been ok if her hair was not a mess and the box was not damaged. For me this was a collectors item and needed to be in great condition. Will reorder and hope for the best. This is the second time this has happened to me with a Harry Potter doll. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair
customer_reviews.text: Wish the hair was redder so it seemed more like Ginny. But my daughter still loved the doll.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowdancernmc

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was Speedy and Product as Expected
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in excellent condition. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: HappyPsalm

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as an Angel Tree gift for my student. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Buel

customer_reviews.title: So excited!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited to get Ginny! Its her favorite Harry Potter character!
customer_reviews.author: C Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and you Granddaughter loved it😍
customer_reviews.text: Harry Potter Birthday party gift for a seven year old Granddaughter ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Doll was properly boxed. Gift for granddaughter has learning incentive, legally blind and struggling with reading.

customer_reviews.title: Need by own
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister. Want to get myself one now

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the doll
customer_reviews.text: I orders this for my kids who love the Harry Potter storyline. They really like the doll.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and presentation

customer_reviews.title: Great doll
customer_reviews.text: She is very pretty. I like her face and body type and outfit

customer_reviews.title: Faithful representation of story character.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful doll, arrived quickly well packed in perfect condition. I plan to keep it in the box in a display of collector dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Vada

customer_reviews.title: really looks ike the real actress!
customer_reviews.text: love her! she really looks like GinnyWeasley! they did a great job with her and you can pose her for display!

product_meta.title: Mattel Harry Potter Ginny Weasley Doll
product_meta.description: This film-inspired doll brings Harry Potter and his friends back to Hogwarts! Young fans can recreate their favorite scenes from the movies, or imagine their very own, with Harry Potter dolls. Ginny Weasley doll looks just like her character in the iconic film series and comes dressed in her signature Hogwarts uniform, complete with a Gryffindor robe. With eleven "joints" -in the neck, shoulders, hips, knees, elbows and wrists -Ginny doll is ready for action storytelling and spellbinding poses! Doll comes with a personalized wand matching the one Ginny uses on screen -perfect for casting spells and inspiring imaginative play. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: Fans and collectors alike will love recreating their favorite storylines from the movies and imagining their own!
Ginny Weasley doll's outfit is based on the signature Hogwarts uniform, with a Gryffindor robe and personalized wand that fans can use to help the young witch cast spells and charms
Fun details, like the Gryffindor emblem on her robe, make Ginny doll look just like her character in the celebrated Harry Potter film series
Ginny doll has eleven "joints" That allow for limitless posing possibilities and action-storytelling on her Quest to escape from the chamber of secrets
Harry Potter and his friends are better together! Young fans can collect each of their favorite characters for even more fun and expanded play

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars772 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
